titleStmt.title: L. J. Cist to James F. Robinson
CWG7646

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1862-1863

creation.placeName: St. Louis, St. Louis County, Missouri

body.p:
JOHN HOW, President.
ISAAC ROSENFELD, Jr., Cashier.
L. J. CIST, Assistant Cashier
AUTHORIZED CAPITAL,
$1,000,000.
STATE SAVINGS ASSOCIATION,
St. Louis, Mo., March 25th 1863
Govr Jas F. Robinson
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir

Will you be kind enough to inform me the date of your election as Governor of Kentucky, & also the date on which your present term of office will expire, by the Inauguration of your Successor, & oblige,

With great respect
Your obd Sevt
L. J. Cist

L. J. Cist
St. Louis
Ansd Apr 2 1863
